quotes.quote: When Paul Bunyan died, they buried him at sea. But the little fishes fed on his body and turned into sea dragons, and the squid drank his blood and turned into krakens, and Anansi stole one of Paul’s eyeballs to look at the stars.
quotes.speaker: The Uncle Nevercloned Stories

quotes.quote: When will the orders arrive? Now? Can they be sent faster?
quotes.speaker: Vadim Kozlov
quotes.work: Axioms from the Minutes of the Central Directorate

quotes.quote: Do not assume the battleground is impartial or in your favor.
quotes.speaker: Rejinaldo Leonardo Pedro Bolivar de Alencar-Araripe

quotes.quote: A well-prepared businessman has bulletproof contracts and bulletproof suits.
quotes.speaker: Hutama
quotes.work: We are All Destined to Prosper

quotes.quote: You fail to reap the bounty of the seas not because your people lack the means, but because you lack the imagination.
quotes.speaker: Duncan Hughes

quotes.quote: I cannot dislike the Bytegeist, because despite its insufferable chirpy ubiquity, it is entirely too helpful to be without.
quotes.speaker: Élodie

quotes.quote: John Henry smiled at the Crawler and he said: 'Sure, you can move a lot of dirt, but let's see who gets to the Mohorovicic discontinuity first.' And he picked up his shovel and waited for the starting gun.
quotes.speaker: The Uncle Nevercloned Stories

quotes.quote: Behold unsleeping Cynosure, the golem whose minds span kalpa.
quotes.speaker: Kavitha Thakur

quotes.quote:
Beyond this flesh,
Beyond this dream,
I have danced among the stars.
My children dance on endless worlds.
quotes.speaker: Kavitha Thakur
quotes.work: Glorious Key of the Exodite Sutra

quotes.quote: You may say: 'I remember,' but we must also remember what our parents remember, and what our parents' parents remember as well.
quotes.speaker: Samatar Jama Barre

quotes.quote: All conflict stems from scarcity. Not enough resources? Find more. Not enough personnel? Train more. Not enough time or space? Create more.
quotes.speaker: Vadim Kozlov
quotes.work: New Discourses on Consolidated Colonial Establishments

quotes.quote: Within the Drone Sphere I am reminded of nothing less than the apex of Versailles with each man and woman a Sun King or Queen, surrounded by fawning courtiers.
quotes.speaker: Élodie

quotes.quote: I bring forth myself; I shall be the ever-born and the never-dead.
quotes.speaker: The Exodus Sutra II:3

quotes.quote: I eagerly anticipate the results of infusing additional solar capital into moribund benthic ecosystems. Disruption is always a positive force.
quotes.speaker: Suzanne Fielding

quotes.quote: Let this system be a model for the interaction of our work and our society: Great forces acting on countless agents, exploiting the ironclad laws of physical sciences, creating instances of action and progress.
quotes.speaker: Kozlov
quotes.work: Axioms from the Minutes of the Central Directorate

quotes.quote: The five mythical creatures of Earth are: The dragon, the unicorn, the griffin, the llama, and the chimera.
quotes.speaker: Ganesh Edmin

quotes.quote: Miracles are the Divine made manifest in through man’s work. You set to make a warehouse. God Himself has made it a cathedral to His glory through your unseeing eyes, unwilling hands, and unwitting craft.
quotes.speaker: Thakurite Epistles 6:2-4

quotes.quote: 'Well, mebbe you ain't heated it enough yet,' said Paul Bunyan, and he took the plasma out of the hohlraum, rubbed it hard between his hands until the Aleph-field de-resolved itself, and put it back in the Holon Chamber. 'I reckon that'll be warm enough to dry your boots,' he said.
quotes.speaker: The Uncle Nevercloned Stories

quotes.quote: The goal of the Chief should be to align the personal with the larger political, economic, and organizational goals. What's good for the organization's always what's best for the individual.
quotes.speaker: Suzanne Marjorie Fielding

quotes.quote: The manifestation of free thought is the most complex mechanical process humankind has ever sought to master. We must equip our mechanics with the right tools.
quotes.speaker: Daoming Sochua

quotes.quote: Your most valuable human asset has one foot in the code and one foot in the world and is still on solid ground.
quotes.speaker: Suzanne Marjorie Fielding

quotes.quote: Where possible, the opponent's advantage of ground must be negated. If you cannot see down on your enemy, you should knock the enemy off his pedestal.
quotes.speaker: Rejinaldo Leonardo Pedro Bolivar de Alencar-Araripe

quotes.quote: The easiest way to understand social systems is to implement them in code. The best way to optimize social systems is to let the code change the world.
quotes.speaker: Daoming Sochua

quotes.quote: Some ideas are bad ideas. Make better ideas and you make better colonies.
quotes.speaker: Vadim Kozlov
quotes.work: Axioms from the Minutes of the Central Directorate

quotes.quote: Solving problems with force is satisfying because one gets feedback right away.
quotes.speaker: Rejinaldo Leonardo Pedro Bolivar de Alencar-Araripe

quotes.quote: 'Rise up, O people,' said the Lord of Cosmos. 'I shall lead you to many gardens.' And the people took their place among the stars with great rejoicing.
quotes.speaker: The Exodus Sutra I:2

quotes.quote: There's an old soldier's axiom: 'You can't kill what you can't see.' The inverse is also true.
quotes.speaker: Rejinaldo Leonardo Pedro Bolivar de Alencar-Araripe

quotes.quote: Open your eyes. Open them again. Look ahead of yourself. Look ahead again.
quotes.speaker: Kavitha Thakur
quotes.work: Glorious Key of the Exodite Tantra: 5th Unfolding

quotes.quote: Anansi looked at the man's genome and said: 'Messy! Messy! Who can live like this?' He took a broom and swept up the genome, and when the man woke up, he felt much better.
quotes.speaker: The Uncle Nevercloned Stories

quotes.quote: What I like best about quantum computing is that we get something for nothing from someone else's somewhere.
quotes.speaker: Suzanne Marjorie Fielding

quotes.quote: Are we such poor, simple creatures? Give it a large enough glossary and even a rude gridtap can move us around like so many chessmen.
quotes.speaker: Lena Ebner

quotes.quote:
I went to depart this world.
I stood at the threshold
I heard,
'Do not leave, we need you!'
I returned, by compassion moved.
quotes.speaker: Kavitha Thakur

quotes.quote: Maui and Hina, having seen all the oceans of Earth, raised their eyes to new oceans, where they still sail.
quotes.speaker: Nainoa Charles

quotes.quote: I am told that the planet's core is hot, dense, and explosive, and I am reminded of our Parliament.
quotes.speaker: Élodie

quotes.quote: Even a breath on the scale can determine success or failure. See the breath before it forms, and all scales balance in your favor.
quotes.speaker: Han Jae Moon

quotes.quote: The independent spirit will always prevail over the dependent. We will control our own destiny and our own survival, even if we have to bend the rules of reality itself.
quotes.speaker: Duncan Hughes

quotes.quote: Geneticists create a thing which nurtures and sustains in the short term but proves toxic in the long term, and yet we think of overprotective parents as a quaint artifact of pre-Mistake culture.
quotes.speaker: Élodie

quotes.quote: We learned too late the importance of safeguarding the precious gifts of nature. The parting gift of the elephant was the wisdom to be good stewards of the next planet.
quotes.speaker: Samatar Jama Barre

quotes.quote: If the planet didn't want to be tapped, then why is it made out of fuel?
quotes.speaker: Hutama
quotes.work: We are All Destined to Prosper

quotes.quote: See the planet as a mother who loves her children and nourishes their growth, and much of this new world becomes less mysterious.
quotes.speaker: Samatar Jama Barre
